Sr. Cloud Network Engineer
The Senior Cloud Network Engineer works with a team of professionals in the design and operation of Carrier Grade SaaS delivery infrastructure. This position is responsible for the implementation and support of network infrastructure and components within cloud and Datacenter (routers, switches, LBs, firewalls, ALB?ELB, Security Groups, TGW, etc.) ensuring network uptime of 99.99%.
As a Sr. Cloud Network Engineer, a Typical Day Might Include the Following:
Implementation of Cloud service integrations for network requirements and data flows
Implementation of AWS, VPC and VPC endpoints
Implementation of Cloud VPN and BGP peering
Test and turn-up of Cloud based network devices, Firewalls, Load Balancer
Support and operate a Carrier Grade Networks
Configure advanced routing protocols OSPF and BGP
Support and configure SSL and IPsec VPN technologies
Support and configure firewalls, switches and routers 
Participate in Incident, Problem, Service and Change management
Follow the company Code of Ethics and NICE inContact policies and procedures at all times
Communicate in an effective and professional way with customers in and outside of NICE inContact
Be available to participate in and on-call support rotation
 
To Land This Gig You'll Need:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Business Information Systems or similar field of study, or equivalent work experience required.
6+ years proven work related experience is required in configuration of OSPF, BGP, Layer7 switching, VPNs and VoIP related protocols. 
Understanding of Cloud Formation templates (YAML/JSON) and automation orchestrators 
Familiar with DNS and AWS Route53
Experience configuring AWS VPC and related VPC endpoints
Experience with AWS VPC Gateways
Solid understanding with AWS Routing, VPNs, BGP Peering, NAT
Advanced understanding of TCP/IP is required, including the ability to perform and analyze packet captures. 
VoIP experience is good to have, with preferred understanding of SIP Peering and Trunking.
Ability to quickly diagnose and resolve problems is essential.
Excellent time management skills and a Team player.
Knowledge with network management tools and protocol
Auditory and PCI experience a plus, with security issues/vulnerabilities and countermeasures
